name: CHI Saint Joseph Health - Saint Joseph London
description: Saint Joseph London is a 150-bed regional hospital established in 1926, serving the London, Kentucky community and surrounding areas. The hospital provides comprehensive medical care including emergency services, diagnostic imaging, cancer care, breast care, primary care, and various specialty services. The facility features private patient rooms, state-of-the-art technology, and serves patients across southeastern Kentucky including Clay, Laurel, Jackson, Knox, Pulaski, Rockcastle and Whitley counties.
source: Verified from official website and CommonSpirit Health information
hours_of_operation: Open 24 hours for emergency services. General hours vary by department.
eligibility_requirements: Open to all patients. Accepts most major insurance plans. Financial assistance available for qualifying patients.
populations_served: Residents of southeastern Kentucky including Clay, Laurel, Jackson, Knox, Pulaski, Rockcastle and Whitley counties
cost_information: Accepts most major insurance plans. Financial assistance available for qualifying patients. Cost estimates available online.
